name: Lost To Darkness
description:
After a shipwreck you’re wake up in a strange island in the end of the day. You’ll have to explore the island in order to find some engine part to repair a boat to leave this horrific island. For that, you need to explore the island and to solve puzzles. All along your exploration you’ll understand what happened in this mysterious island... 

Lost To Darkness is a game where you played a man who has woken up in a strange island, you'll have to explore it, solve puzzles and collect engine parts in order to repair your boat and leave this island. All along the game you'll understand what happened  in this mysterious island through all the notes that are scatered in all the map. But be careful because something strange happened in this mysterious island. 

Game Programming  : 

Franci ALGERA

Karim AL-HOMSI

Game Design : 

Tom BECKER

Thomas MONNERIE

Game Art: 

Elora Loigerot
